msg: mention that todo and changes pages are excluded from the web site cvs logs

msg: do not generate cvs logs for the todo and changes pages as they are modified too often

author: vmassol
msg: added support for a debug mode that outputs the result of the cvs log command to a debug file + support for all revisions of a file (and not only the latest revision) + removed previous revision support as it is now included in the general support for all revisions

author: vmassol
msg: added support for a 'nowrap' attribute for the TD tag
